title: Ad Creative Strategist
job_overview:
As our Ad Creative Strategist, you’ll be responsible for thinking up fresh, bold, culturally relevant ad ideas that connect deeply with hoopers worldwide. You will conceptualize full campaign directions, script out ideas for video and photo ads, and work alongside designers/editors to bring these visions to life.

This is a creative leadership role — we need someone who can create ideas that turn products into culture Upgrade to see actual infonts.
